attributes.action: Atleast £10 an hour for community Carer's and care home carers.
attributes.background: Give carers, as stated above atleast £10 an hour for their working shift as they are under valued and deserve more credit for what they do.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase minimum wage for social care staff to £10.72: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316909

Raise the minimum wage for Domiciliary Care Workers to £12 per hour immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314394
